SEARCH

Class Expense

java.lang.Object
Expense
public class Expense extends Object
Represents an expense claim made by an employee. Each expense has a date, description, category, and amount, and can be approved or unapproved.

  • Constructor Summary

    Creates a new Expense with the specified details.
